\newcommand{\ottt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{t}  ,\ \ottnt{c}  ,\ \ottnt{v}  ,\ \ottnt{s}  ,\ \ottnt{n}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{triv} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{box} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{unbox} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} ) .  \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{0}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[]}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{t}  ::  \ottnt{t'} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottK}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{K}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \star }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}  ,\ \ottnt{D}  ,\ \ottnt{E}  ,\ \ottnt{S}  ,\ \ottnt{U}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{X}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \top }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathbb{C} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Nat} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{?}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{

\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Gamma , \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}}

}{

{\ottdruleKXXvarName}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdruleKXXarrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{K\_arrow}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleKXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  : \star   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B}  : \star  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}  : \star }{%
{\ottdruleKXXarrowName}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdruleKXXprodName}[0]{\ottdrulename{K\_prod}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleKXXprod}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  : \star   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B}  : \star  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{A}  \times  \ottnt{B}   : \star }{%
{\ottdruleKXXprodName}{}%

 \Gamma  \vdash   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B}   : \star }{%

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXTransName}{}%

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXArrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Arrow}}

}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)} }{%

}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXForallName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_Forall}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXForall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma , \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A}   \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottsym{(}   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXForallName}{}%
}}

%% defn typecons
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXReflName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_Refl}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXRefl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXReflName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXBoxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_Box}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXBox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \mathbb{C}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXBoxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXUnboxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_Unbox}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXUnbox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \mathbb{C}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \sim  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXUnboxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXListName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_List}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXList}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   \ottsym{)}  \sim  \ottsym{(}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{B}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXListName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXArrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_Arrow}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXArrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \sim  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXArrowName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXProdName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_Prod}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXProd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \sim  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXProdName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXForallName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_Forall}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXForall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma , \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A}   \vdash  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{)}  \sim  \ottsym{(}   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXForallName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntypecons}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{B} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXRefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXBox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXUnbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXList{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXArrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXProd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCXXForall{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn type
\newcommand{\ottdrulevarPName}[0]{\ottdrulename{varP}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulevarP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \, \in \, \Gamma  \quad   \Gamma \,\text{Ok}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulevarPName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBoxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Box}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleBox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{box}   :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \mathbb{S}  ).  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{X}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{)}  }{%
{\ottdruleBoxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleUnboxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Unbox}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleUnbox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{unbox}   :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \mathbb{S}  ).  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \rightarrow  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{)}  }{%
{\ottdruleUnboxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleunitPName}[0]{\ottdrulename{unitP}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleunitP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma \,\text{Ok} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{triv}   :   \mathsf{Unit}  }{%
{\ottdruleunitPName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulezeroPName}[0]{\ottdrulename{zeroP}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulezeroP}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma \,\text{Ok} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{0}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdrulezeroPName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{succ}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulesucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdrulesuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulencaseName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ncase}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulencase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{C}   \quad   \mathsf{nat}( \ottnt{C} ) =   \mathsf{Nat}   }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Nat}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{0}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulencaseName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleemptyName}[0]{\ottdrulename{empty}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma \,\text{Ok}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  : \star  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{[]}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon   \top  ).   \mathsf{List}\, \ottmv{X}   }{%
{\ottdruleemptyName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleconsName}[0]{\ottdrulename{cons}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulecons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ::  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}  }{%
{\ottdruleconsName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulepairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulepair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdrulepairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulelam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} ) .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulelamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleLamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleLam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma , \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A}   \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \Lambda ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ) . \ottnt{t}   :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{A} ).  \ottnt{B}  }{%
{\ottdruleLamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletypeAppName}[0]{\ottdrulename{typeApp}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletypeApp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :   \forall ( \ottmv{X}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B} ).  \ottnt{C}    \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   [  \ottnt{A}  ]  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{X}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{C} }{%
{\ottdruletypeAppName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSubName}[0]{\ottdrulename{Sub}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSub}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A}  <\hspace{-2px}\colon  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleSubName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelcaseName}[0]{\ottdrulename{lcase}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulelcase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{C}   \quad   \mathsf{list}( \ottnt{C} ) =   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{List}\, \ottnt{A}   \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{case}\, \ottnt{t} \,\mathsf{of}\, \ottsym{[]}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottsym{(}   \ottmv{x}  ::  \ottmv{y}   \ottsym{)}  \to  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdrulelcaseName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleappName}[0]{\ottdrulename{app}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{C}   \quad   \mathsf{fun}( \ottnt{C} ) =  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}  }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleappName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulefstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulefst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \mathsf{prod}( \ottnt{B} ) =   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulefstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulesndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulesnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \mathsf{prod}( \ottnt{B} ) =   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulesndName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevarP{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleUnbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleunitP{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulezeroP{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesucc{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulencase{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulecons{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulepair{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleLam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruletypeApp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSub{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelcase{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulefst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulesnd{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn castIn
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXvarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_var}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \, \in \, \Gamma}%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \Rightarrow  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXvarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXzeroName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_zero}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXzero}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{0}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{0}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXzeroName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXtrivName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_triv}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXtriv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{triv}   \Rightarrow   \mathsf{triv}   :   \mathsf{Unit}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXtrivName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_succ}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXsuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXfstTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_fst2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXfstTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \ottnt{A}  \times  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXfstTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsndTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_snd2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsndTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \ottnt{A}  \times  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXsndTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \Rightarrow   \lambda ( \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ) .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXlamName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefncastIn}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{\ottcom{Cast insertion}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXzero{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXtriv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXsucc{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXpair{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXfstTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXsndTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXlam{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTyping}{
\ottdefnkind{}\ottdefnctxOk{}\ottdefnsubtype{}\ottdefntypecons{}\ottdefntype{}\ottdefncastIn{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsTyping
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}

\ottall

\begin{verbatim}
Definition rules:        62 good    0 bad
Definition rule clauses: 117 good    0 bad
